com.diffplug.gradle

Class ProjectPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.gradle.ProjectPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.gradle.api.Plugin<org.gradle.api.Project>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BndManifestPlugin, BuildPropertiesPlugin, ExcludeBuildFolderPlugin, ProjectDepsPlugin, SwtPlugin

    public abstract class ProjectPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.gradle.api.Plugin<org.gradle.api.Project>
    Base implementation of Plugin which prevents double-application.
